title: Is Pence Trump’s alter-ego? - Quora
tags: Donald Trump Picks Mike Pence as Running Mate (July 2016)

response.answer_text: In some ways yes. Pence is calm, cool, level headed. Trump is an overbearing brash troll. Both see the same end, but they have different means to get there.

I don't think Trump's actual ego would allow for any kind of second. There's a reason you've barely heard the guy say boo in 4 years, but cant escape a Donald trump tweet, gaffe, or commentary if you wanted to.
